agramathya ranil wikramasinhage dashaka hatharaka deshapalana gamanmage suwishesha awastha aawaranaya kala heta dakina ranil pradarshanaya 2017 agosthu masa 17 wani brahaspathinda sawasa 3.30 ta kolambaa bandaranayaka jathyanthara sammanthrana shalawe di arambae.

mawanalla pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathidhurayen thama iwath karamin palath palana wishayabhara amathiwaraya lesa sabaragamuwa pradhana amathi mahipala herath mahatha di thibu niyogaya awalangu karana lesata hitapu sabhapathi pi. pi. wikramasinha mahatha kala illima kagalla mahadhikarana winisuru gamini amarasekara mahatha eeye prathikshepa keleya.sabhawe katayuthu karagena yamata upa sabhapathi em. es. mohomad kamel mahatha mawanalla pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi dhuraye katayuthu kirima athhituwamin athuru thahanam niyogayak nikuth karana lesata pethsamkara wikramasinha mahatha kala illimada iwatha damu mahadhikarana winisuruwaraya pethsame karunuwalata labana agosthu 20 dina wirodhatha gonu karana lesa wagauththarakara maha amathi mahipala herath mahathata niyoga keleya.pethsamkaru illa sitina sahana labadima sandaha karunu nisi paridi thahawuru kara nomathi bawada pethsamkaruge illim iwatha damamin winisuru waraya danwa sitiyeya.2014.06.23 dina 1865/25 darana gasat niwedanaya mangin thama ema dhurayen iwath kirimata sabaragamu maha amathiwaraya dun niyogayata erehiwa wikramasinha mahatha rit 4472 naduwak kagalla palath bada mahadhikaranaye gonu kara thibini.maha amathiwarayage niyogaya bala rahitha karannayi athulu illim kihipayakata adala sarsiyorari rit aagnyawak nikuth karannayi paminilikara wikramasinha mahatha illa thibu athara sabhapathi dhurayen iwath kirime thinduwa athhituwana lesath nawa sabhapathiwarayeku pathkirime thinduwa walakalana lesath wikramasinha mahatha adhikaranayen illa thibini.wagauththarakara sabaragamu maha amathiwaraya wenuwen nithignya dinesh jayawardhana mahathage upades matha nithignya ranjith senadhira mahatha peni siti athara paminilikara pradeshiya sabha hitapu sabhapathi pi. pi. wikramasinha mahatha wenuwen nithignya nimal rajapaksha mahathage upades matha janadhipathi nithignya wijayadasa rajapaksha mahatha karunu dakwiya.paminilikara pi. pi. wikramasinha mahatha maha amathiwarayata erehiwa sarsiyorari rit aagnyawak labaganima sandaha idiripath kara thibu karunu ee sandaha pramanawath nathayi sandahan karamin winisuru gamini amarasinha mahatha wikramasinha mahathage illim prathikshepa kele yayi me pilibandawa karunu dakwamin mahipala herath maha amathiwaraya wenuwen karunu dakwana nithignya dinesh jayawardhana mahatha pawasiya.
